TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BevelBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class BevelBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect
.class public auto ansi sealed BevelBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect

summary.span: 创建凹凸效果，根据指定的曲线提升图像表面。

span.span: Creates a bevel which raises the surface of the image according to a specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果呈现为软件。bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不应将位图效果应用于大视觉对象或动画，因为这样可能会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations as this can degrade performance. 凹凸效果类型（凹凸曲线）由 属性确定。The type of bevel (bevel curve) is determined by the property. 是 SDK 随附的几个影响之一。 is one of several effects that are shipped with the SDK. 其他影响包括：Other effects include: - - - - 下图显示了应用于可视对象（在此情况下应用于 ）的 。The following illustration shows a applied to a visual object (in this case applied to a ). ![屏幕快照：比较 normal 和具有凹凸效果按钮](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "屏幕截图：比较正常按钮与凹凸效果按钮")![Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons") 下图显示了 的几个基本属性的影响。The following illustrations show the effect of several basic properties of . 属性指定凹凸效果的宽度：The property specifies how wide the bevel is: ![屏幕快照：比较 BevelWidth 值](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "屏幕截图：比较 BevelWidth 值")![Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values") 属性指定凹凸效果的曲线：The property specifies the curve of the bevel: ![屏幕快照：比较 EdgeProfile 的值](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "屏幕截图：比较 EdgeProfile 值")![Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile") 属性指定凹凸效果的止裂槽：The property specifies the relief of the bevel: ![屏幕快照：比较止裂属性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "屏幕截图：比较 relief 属性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") 属性指定凹凸效果阴影的平滑程度：The property specifies how smooth the shadows of the bevel are: ![屏幕快照：比较平滑度属性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "屏幕截图：比较 Smoothness 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") 属性指定 "虚拟光" 所来自的方向，该方向创建凹凸效果的阴影：The property specifies from which direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel: ![屏幕快照：比较灯光角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "屏幕截图：比较光线角度")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles")

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法会隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 创建此 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

summary.span: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置凹凸效果的曲线。

public: property double LightAngle { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LightAngle : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置创造棱台阴影的“虚拟光”所来自的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel.
The direction of the virtual light source.

value.span: 有效范围是 0-360（度），0 表示对象的右侧，连续值围绕对象逆时针移动。

span.span: The valid range is from 0-360 (degrees) with 0 specifying the right-hand side of the object and successive values moving counter-clockwise around the object.

value.span: 棱台的阴影位于入射光的对侧。

span.span: The shadows of the bevel are on the opposite side of where the light is cast.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了此属性给定值的光线方向。The following diagram shows what direction light comes from for a given value of this property. 棱台的阴影是从光角度的另一侧进行转换的。Shadows of the bevel are cast on the opposite side from the light angle. ![关系图： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "关系图：DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照：比较灯光角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "屏幕截图：比较光线角度")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

public: property double Relief { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Relief : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置凹凸效果的起伏高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the relief of the bevel.
The height of the relief of the bevel.

value.span: 有效范围介于0和1之间， 1的起伏最大（最暗的阴影）。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 having the most relief (darkest shadows).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照：比较止裂属性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "屏幕截图：比较 relief 属性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

summary.span: 获取或设置凹凸效果阴影的平滑程度。

span.span: Gets or sets how smooth the shadows of the bevel are.

value.span: 表示凹凸效果阴影的平滑程度的值。

span.span: Value indicating how smooth the bevel shadows are.

value.span: 有效范围介于0和1之间， 1为平滑。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 being the smoothest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照：比较平滑度属性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "屏幕截图：比较 Smoothness 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
